inventory = {'apples': 50, 'oranges': 30, 'bananas': 20}

total_items = sum(inventory.values())
fruit_names = list(inventory.keys())

inventory.update({'grapes': 40, 'apples': 55})

for fruit, count in inventory.items():
    print(f"{fruit}: {count}")

filtered = {k: v for k, v in inventory.items() if v > 25}
